 Gets movement cost from the 2-dimensional map -1 blocks off all movement there.
static List< string > Path (int startx, int starty, int endx, int endy, int endz, int csx, int csy)
static int[,] ReadMap (string map, int mapx, int mapy)
 The main entry point for the pathfinding routines. AstarNode2D is derived from AStar then the StarPath class creates an instance of AStar and uses AstarNode2D to override the methds in AStar.cs. Using Path method as an entry and return point from/to BotMe. Also StartPath is used to make maps and check limits as well as print the map out in a console if we use console apps.

int  y 
) [static]

Gets movement cost from the 2-dimensional map -1 blocks off all movement there.

Parameters:
x X-coordinate
y Y-coordinate
Returns:
Returns movement cost at the specified point in the map
static int [,] Games.Pathfinding.AStar2DTest.StartPath.ReadMap ( string  map,
int  mapx,
int  mapy 
) [static]

The main entry point for the pathfinding routines. AstarNode2D is derived from AStar then the StarPath class creates an instance of AStar and uses AstarNode2D to override the methds in AStar.cs. Using Path method as an entry and return point from/to BotMe. Also StartPath is used to make maps and check limits as well as print the map out in a console if we use console apps.

Property Documentation

int [,] Games.Pathfinding.AStar2DTest.StartPath.Map [static, get, set]

Entry and Exit from BotMe is StartPath.Path CurrenMap is the map read from the file in ReadMap.

int Games.Pathfinding.AStar2DTest.StartPath.xL [static, get, set]

XL/YL comes from the map maker description - BotMe /gm ---> ReadMap sets this.
